content:
## n8n@1.37.1 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@1.37.0...n8n@1.37.1) for this version.
**Release date:** 2024-04-11 /// warning | Breaking change Please note that this version contains a breaking change for self-hosted n8n. It removes the `--file` flag for the `execute` CLI command. If you have scripts relying on the `--file` flag, update them to first import the workflow and then execute it using the `--id` flag. Refer to [CLI commands](/hosting/cli-commands.md) for more information on CLI options. /// This release contains bug fixes. For full release details, refer to [Releases](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/releases) on GitHub.
